pages.title: Blood Orchid Products
pages.text: Extracts of the $(l:resources/blood_orchid)Blood Orchid$(/l) have an intense effect when consumed: they may put you in a $(thing)Frenzy$().$(br)Damage, attack speed, movement speed and knockback resistance are buffed with each kill. The higher the effect's level, the higher the buff. Not scoring a kill in 10 seconds will debuff you instead.

pages.title: Frenzy Stacking
pages.text: Instead of resetting the duration, applying another $(thing)Frenzy$() effect will increase its potency instead.$(br2)In order to get the most out of the effect, apply one with a long duration first, then stack up with shorter effects.
A Petal's active ingredient can be extracted into a thick solution. Almost smells like rose water, but its effect is definitely... $(italic)a little more effervescent$().
The $(thing)Frenzy$() effect you may get starts out low, but lasts a bit longer.
The $(thing)Frenzy$() effect you may get is relatively short, but starts out quite potent.

pages.title: Rabbit Poison
pages.text: A truly nasty brew. Tastes exactly like what you would expect.
